Pre-Game Insights: Utah is looking to end its eight-game home slide with a win against Miami.
The Jazz's 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season are just 0.5 more made shots on average than the 13.6 per game the Heat give up.
The Jazz average 111.3 points per game, 7.2 fewer points than the 118.5 the Jazz allow.
Miami is 10-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
